c1.name: Beginnings Determined at the Roots
c1.effect: Tighnari's Charged Attack CRIT Rate is increased by 15%.

c2.name: Origins Known From the Stem
c2.effect:
When there are opponents within the Vijnana-Khanda Field created by **Vijnana-Phala Mine**, Tighnari gains 20% Dendro DMG Bonus.
The effect will last up to 6s if the field's duration ends or if it no longer has opponents within it.

c3.name: Fortunes Read Amongst the Branches
c3.effect:
Increases the Level of **Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Withering Glimpsed in the Leaves
c4.effect: When **Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft** is unleashed, all nearby party members gain 60 Elemental Mastery for 8s. If the Fashioner's Tanglevine Shaft triggers a Burning, Bloom, Quicken, or Spread reaction, their Elemental Mastery will be further increased by 60. This latter case will also refresh the buff state's duration.

c5.name: Comprehension Amidst the Flowers
c5.effect:
Increases the Level of **Vijnana-Phala Mine** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Karma Adjudged From the Leaden Fruit
c6.effect: **Wreath Arrow**'s charging time is decreased by 0.9s, and will produce 1 additional Clusterbloom Arrow upon hit. This arrow deals 150% of Tighnari's ATK as DMG.
